title: AutomaticSize
content:
This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.
To submit a bug report on the content, see
https://devforum.roblox.com/c/bug-reports/documentation-issues/72

name: AutomaticSize
type: enum
summary: |
  UI objects with Class.GuiObject.AutomaticSize|AutomaticSize enabled will
  increase in size up to maximum size allowed by the parent (if there is one)
  and no smaller than the Class.GuiObject.Size|Size property bounds.
description: |
  UI objects with Class.GuiObject.AutomaticSize|AutomaticSize enabled will
  increase in size up to maximum size allowed by the parent (if there is one)
  and no smaller than the Class.GuiObject.Size|Size property bounds. To enable
  Enum.AutomaticSize, set the value to an enum value other than None.

  This enum is used by Class.GuiObject.AutomaticSize and
  Class.ScrollingFrame.AutomaticCanvasSize to determine whether and how
  resizing occurs based on child content.

  For more information, see
  Automatic Sizing.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
items:
  - name: None
    summary: |
      Default sizing behavior.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: X
    summary: |
      Automatically resize element along X-axis to fit child contents.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: 'Y'
    summary: |
      Automatically resize element along Y-axis to fit child contents. Text
      Objects will only resize along the Y-axis if TextWrapped is enabled.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: XY
    summary: |
      Automatically resize element along X and Y axes to fit child contents.
    value: 3
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
